ing: 1 stalk celery with leaves, finely chopped
n: Peppery Coleslaw with Cucumbers and Celery
des: "Tired of sweet coleslaw? Try this for a nice change."
ins: Mix cabbage, cucumber, celery, cilantro, and parsley in a bowl. Whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, onion powder, salt, and black pepper in a separate bowl; stir dressing into slaw until thoroughly mixed. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
